original_text: “Say now to the rebellious house, Do you not know what these things mean? Tell them, behold, the king of Babylon came to Jerusalem, and took her king and her princes and brought them to him to Babylon.
korean_text: 너는 반역하는 족속에게 묻기를 너희가 이 비유를 깨닫지 못하겠느냐 하고 그들에게 말하기를 바벨론 왕이 예루살렘에 이르러 왕과 고관을 사로잡아 바벨론 자기에게로 끌어 가고

sentences.original_text: Do you not know what these things mean?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 이것들이 무엇을 의미하는지 알지 못하느냐?

sentences.original_text: the king of Babylon came to Jerusalem,
and took her king and her princes
and brought them to him to Babylon.”
